title: Laptop
decription: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

title: Smartphone
decription: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

title: Speaker
decription: MZ M423SP - Sound Bar Dynamic Thunder Sound with High Bass 10 W Bluetooth Speaker.

title: Television
decription: You can enjoy unlimited entertainment at the comfort of your home with this smart TV.

title: Watches
decription: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

title: Neckband
decription: Featuring sophisticated Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology, this neckband immerses you in a personalised auditory experience.
